colors.title: How do I change colors?
colors.message:
To make a color, put a color code with `§` in front of it.

Example: `§cHello world!`

Use `§r` to remove the color.

Example: `§cHello §rworld!`

multiline.title: How do I add multiple lines?
multiline.message:
To make a multiline message in the config, put a `|` at the start, and then put each line on a new line. 

Example: 
```yaml
content: |
  Hello world!
  This is a multiline message!
```
